## AnsiColorName type

ANSI color names for the standard 16-color palette.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type AnsiColorName = 'black' | 'red' | 'green' | 'yellow' | 'blue' | 'magenta' | 'cyan' | 'white' | 'brightBlack' | 'brightRed' | 'brightGreen' | 'brightYellow' | 'brightBlue' | 'brightMagenta' | 'brightCyan' | 'brightWhite';
```
